channel.title: 2 simple yet smart requests
channel.description:
items in my server...
how can i change it so that berseker ring and such items dont say "!! NON EXISTING ITEM - ID ####"
i see warrior ring is good but berseker, archer and stuff dosnt work, help me please
[b]second request[/b]
is there a way to stop items like easter ring from being corrupt? i.e you spawn it and you crash, ive been on servers where you get the ring and wear it to turn into a random egg, i know how to do that but not how to make it not crash
thanks...

item.title: 2 simple yet smart requests
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

lin… in item.cfg ive added berseker ring and stuff it still says non existing item

i just put random numbers to try

item = 6737	Berserker_Ring	A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer.	600000	60000000	80000	9	9	29	9	2	49	49	20	20	49	25	23

[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 10:12:17 AM[/size][hr]oh nvm

it was already in item.cfg but instead of item = ####

it said it3m = #### thanks for help anyways

Read full topic

item.title: 2 simple yet smart requests
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

First request fix: Go to items.cfg and put the item id in there.
Second request fix: You obviously dont have the right cache, or its still a null. Try doing my tutorial where you dont disconnect from the nulls. (In the client hacking)

Read full topic
